title: Wear Captcha
summary: Plugin for "Sleep as Android" to use your Android Wear to disable your alarm!
description: Place your smartwatch on another room over night so you have to walk there to turn your alarm off.When your alarm rings, the watch will show a button to disable it.This App requires "Sleep as Android".
descriptionHTML:
Place your smartwatch on another room over night so you have to walk there to turn your alarm off.
When your alarm rings, the watch will show a button to disable it.

This App requires "Sleep as Android".
recentChanges: Option to stop alarm when watch is disconnected
Implemented service for crash reporting and statistics collection
